languages.text: Из нескольких пирамид на берегах озера одна повреждена больше других. Судя по оплавленным краям и направлениям сломов, именно ее повреждения спровоцировали горение в центре озера.

traits.locale_text: Из нескольких пирамид на берегах озера одна повреждена больше других. Судя по оплавленным краям и направлениям сломов, именно ее повреждения спровоцировали горение в центре озера и попытку подавить его.

languages.text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.
languages.original_text: Из нескольких пирамид на берегах озера одна повреждена больше других. Судя по оплавленным краям и направлениям сломов, именно ее повреждения спровоцировали горение в центре озера.

traits.locale_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, its damages are the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, its damages are the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

languages.text: 沿湖岸排列的所有金字塔中，有一座受损最严重。从融化的边缘和断裂的方向判断，它的损坏就是湖心发生火灾的原因。
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

traits.locale_text: 沿湖岸排列的所有金字塔中，有一座受损最严重。从融化的边缘和断裂的方向判断，它的损坏就是湖心发生火灾的原因。

languages.text: 湖岸に立ち並ぶピラミッドの中に、他よりも損傷が激しいものがある。溶けたエッジと破損の方向から判断して、この破損が湖の中心にある炎を引き起こしたものと思われる。
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

traits.locale_text: 湖岸に立ち並ぶピラミッドの中に、他よりも損傷が激しいものがある。溶けたエッジと破損の方向から判断して、この破損が湖の中心にある炎を引き起こしたものと思われる。

languages.text: Una de las pirámides que rodean la orilla del lago está más dañada que el resto. A juzgar por sus bordes fundidos y la dirección de las roturas, este daño es el que inició los incendios en el centro del lago.
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

traits.locale_text: Una de las pirámides que rodean la orilla del lago está más dañada que el resto. A juzgar por sus bordes fundidos y la dirección de las roturas, este daño es el que inició los {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios{/g} en el centro del lago.

languages.text: Eine der Pyramiden am Ufer des Sees ist stärker beschädigt als die übrigen. Den geschmolzenen Rändern und der Richtung der Bruchstellen nach zu urteilen hat dieser Schaden die Feuer in der Mitte des Sees ausgelöst.
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

traits.locale_text: Eine der Pyramiden am Ufer des Sees ist stärker beschädigt als die übrigen. Den geschmolzenen Rändern und der Richtung der Bruchstellen nach zu urteilen hat dieser Schaden die Feuer in der Mitte des Sees ausgelöst.

languages.text: L'une des pyramides jalonnant les berges du lac est plus endommagée que les autres. À en juger par ses contours partiellement fondus et par l'orientation des fractures, ce sont ces dégâts qui sont à l'origine de l'incendie au centre du lac.
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.

traits.locale_text: L'une des pyramides jalonnant les berges du lac est plus endommagée que les autres. À en juger par ses contours partiellement fondus et par l'orientation des fractures, ce sont ces dégâts qui sont à l'origine de l'incendie au centre du lac.

languages.text: Gölün kıyısındaki piramitlerden biri, diğerlerinden daha hasarlı duruyor. Kısmen erimiş dış kısımlarına ve kopuş yönlerine bakılırsa gölün ortasındaki yangının nedeni, bu hasar gibi görünüyor.
languages.original_text: One of the pyramids lining the lake's shore is more damaged than the rest. Judging by its melted edges and the direction of the breaks, this damage is the thing that started the fires at the lake's centre.
